body_html:
What kind of support were you thinking of?

At this time, there are no concrete plans for any Dart APIs for TensorFlow to be shipped as a flutter package. You may want to use something like https://flutter.io/platform-channels/ to integrate with TensorFlow/TensorFlowLite in your mobile application.

body:
What kind of support were you thinking of?

At this time, there are no concrete plans for any Dart APIs for TensorFlow to be shipped as a flutter package. You may want to use something like https://flutter.io/platform-channels/ to integrate with TensorFlow/TensorFlowLite in your mobile application.
